solution_line_template: The first tree has {first_tree_bpf} branches per foot because {first_tree_branches} / {first_tree_height} = <<{first_tree_branches}/{first_tree_height}={first_tree_bpf}>>{first_tree_bpf}
The second tree tree has {second_tree_bpf} branches per foot because {second_tree_branches} / {second_tree_height} = <<{second_tree_branches}/{second_tree_height}={second_tree_bpf}>>{second_tree_bpf}
The third tree has {third_tree_bpf} branches per foot because {third_tree_branches} / {third_tree_height} = <<{third_tree_branches}/{third_tree_height}={third_tree_bpf}>>{third_tree_bpf}
The fourth tree has {fourth_tree_bpf} branches per foot because {fourth_tree_branches} / {fourth_tree_height} = <<{fourth_tree_branches}/{fourth_tree_height}={fourth_tree_bpf}>>{fourth_tree_bpf}

The total branches per foot is {total_bpf} because {first_tree_bpf} + {second_tree_bpf} + {third_tree_bpf} + {fourth_tree_bpf} = <<{first_tree_bpf}+{second_tree_bpf}+{third_tree_bpf}+{fourth_tree_bpf}={total_bpf}>>{total_bpf}
The average branches per foot is {average_bpf} because {total_bpf} / {num_trees} = <<{total_bpf}/{num_trees}={average_bpf}>>{average_bpf}
